model.name: COTTON CHINO
model.disambiguatingDescription: This Slim Cotton Chino revisits a classic casual piece. Featuring straight legs and a slim fit, it is tailored from a cotton mix with a distinctive wavy closure at zip level. The right belt loop is adorned with signed staples, while a removable Louis Vuitton Staples Edition label - complete with snap hook - supplies an additional signature.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 50% Polyester, 50% Cotton
  • Lining : 100% Cotton
  • Dark Blue
  • Slim Fit
  • Based on a size 40 : Outseam (including waistband) 115 cm/45,2 in; Waist 86 cm/33,8 in; Leg opening 40cm/15,7 in
  • Made in Italy
